apify-actor-start.eventDescription: Flat fee for starting an Actor run.

lol-tool-request.eventDescription: Fee for executing League of Legends tool requests (champion data, summoner info, meta analysis).

tft-tool-request.eventDescription: Fee for executing Teamfight Tactics tool requests (meta decks, item builds, champion recommendations).

valorant-tool-request.eventDescription: Fee for executing Valorant tool requests (character meta, leaderboards, match history).

esports-tool-request.eventDescription: Fee for executing Esports tool requests (schedules, team standings).

tool-request.eventDescription: Fee for executing general tool requests.

prompt-request.eventTitle: Price for completing a prompt request
prompt-request.eventDescription: Flat fee for completing a prompt request.

completion-request.eventTitle: Price for completing a completion request
completion-request.eventDescription: Flat fee for completing a completion request.

resource-request.eventTitle: Price for completing a resource request
resource-request.eventDescription: Flat fee for completing a resource request.

list-request.eventTitle: Price for completing a list request
list-request.eventDescription: Flat fee for completing a list request.
